price: Ɛberε a Yεsomaa (Asomafoͻ) mmienu kᴐᴐ wͻn hͻ no, wͻannye wͻn anni, enti Yεde deε ͻtͻso mmiεnsa bεfoaa wͻn so; na wͻka kyerεε (kuro no mu foͻ no) sε: “Nokorε sε, yεyε mo asomafoͻ’’.
arabic: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمُ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِثٖ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُم مُّرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh arsalnā ilayhimu ith'nayni fakadhabūhumā faʿazzaznā bithālithin faqālū innā ilaykum mur'salūna
translations: but they denied both of them
